article_text:
Here's the latest flier opposing state Rep. Luke Malek, R-Coeur d'Alene, from Wayne Hoffman's Boise-based 501c4 Idaho Freedom Action. It arrived in today's mail. You can see the back side of the flier in the comments section.

Related: Biggest donor to Idaho Freedom Action is embattled Bonneville County GOP leader Beck/Idaho Reports
